title: I got one bugsplat and now I have a leaverbuster...
body: Not understanding... I haven't left any games, but my client always freezes before loading me in. This isn't my fault Riot.

replies.body:
You'll never get a Leaverbuster penalty from a single disconnection from a match. It takes a trend of disconnections before you'll see a Low-priority queue. Bugsplats are often the result of driver or hardware issues that prevent the client from properly communicating with your system. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) as a first step.

Let me know if you have any further issues with this.
